comment: Number of pt bins is #ptedges - 1. Therefore #rebins = #ptedges -1

output.mass: #it{E}/#it{p} ratio for electrons; matched cluster #it{p}_{T} (GeV/#it{c}); #it{E}/#it{p} ratio; electrons
output.nmesons: Number of electrons in each #it{p}_{T} bin; #it{p}_{T} (GeV/#it{c}); #frac{d#it{N}}{d#it{p}_{T}}; electrons
output.spectrum: Number of electrons in each #it{p}_{T} bin; #it{p}_{T} (GeV/#it{c}); #frac{d#it{N}}{d#it{p}_{T}}; electrons
